definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: A red carpet stretched across the cement floor, welcomingvisitors to a huge door that appeared to be forged of solid metal.
sentences.chinese: 水泥地上的红地毯一直延伸到一扇厚厚的金属大门前。

sentences.english: Under the condition of artificial feeding, effect of using cement quadrel to collect eggs was good.
sentences.chinese: 在人工饲养条件下，利用水泥方砖采卵效果良好。

sentences.english: A single concrete tank required for Bio-Module shaft.
sentences.chinese: 生物模块轴需要一个单独的水泥池。

sentences.english: Two bags of cement were parked behind the fence.
sentences.chinese: 两袋水泥放在围墙后面。

sentences.english: In theory, it takes only 12kg of water to hydrate a completely sack of cement.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上说，使一袋水泥完全水化只需要12kg水。

sentences.english: The pressure sensitive behaviors of carbon fiber-reinforced cement-matrix composites with different moisture contents were studied.
sentences.chinese: 对碳纤维水泥基复合材料的压敏特性进行了实验研究。

sentences.english: Cement clinker of green colour can be obtained by using chromium oxide am a colorant.
sentences.chinese: 以氧化铬作为着色剂，可以烧成绿色水泥熟料。

sentences.english: He will also visit an energy-efficient cement plant.
sentences.chinese: 他还将参观一座有效利用能源的水泥厂。

sentences.english: SJL daub can be used to repair cement or concrete products for their outlook defects.
sentences.chinese: SJL胶泥可用于修补混凝土与水泥制品的外观缺陷。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the working principle and design calculation of the clamp frames for cement bonded particle board production.
sentences.chinese: 介绍水泥刨花板夹紧框架的工作原理和设计思路。

sentences.english: The heat storage cement block is arranged underground a straw storehouse.
sentences.chinese: 储热水泥块在存草仓的地下。

sentences.english: This information will be used to help determine the cement slurry specifications for both the dump bailer and cement packer.
sentences.chinese: 这个信息将用来为倾卸筒和水泥封割器确定泥浆规格。

sentences.english: Through simulating test in the laboratory, further anti-skidding performance of exposed-aggregate cement concrete pavement was studied.
sentences.chinese: 针对露石水泥砼路面的抗滑性能进行研究。

sentences.english: The cement hardens quickly, creating an internal cast inside of the fractured vertebra.
sentences.chinese: 骨水泥很快变硬，在骨折椎体内部形成内支架。

sentences.english: Preheater and calciner is key equipment for precalcing production technique.
sentences.chinese: 预热器和分解炉是新型干法水泥生产技术的核心设备。

sentences.english: The blast furnace slag is grinded to have the granularity the same as that of the cement.
sentences.chinese: 高炉矿渣粉需要磨细，粒度与水泥粒度相同。

definition: steel (as raw material)/steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc
chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
